netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic
Class ColumnAttribute

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.component.UIComponent
      javax.faces.component.UIComponentBase
          netgest.bo.xwc.framework.components.XUIComponentBase
              netgest.bo.xwc.components.classic.ColumnAttribute
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.component.StateHolder, netgest.bo.xwc.components.model.Column
Direct Known Subclasses:
ColumnAttribute
public class ColumnAttribute
extends netgest.bo.xwc.framework.components.XUIComponentBase
implements netgest.bo.xwc.components.model.Column

This component represents a Column in a Grid panel It must reside inside of a Columns element in the viewer and allows to customize how columns are rendered

Author:
jcarreira

Field Summary
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> contentHtml
          Marks the content of the column as HTML, this is used when exporting the column values to another format (excel, pdf) and it marks that the content is HTML (or not) and will be converted to final format knowing this.
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBaseProperty<java.lang.String> dataField
          Name of the column of the DataListConnector / boObjectList from the parent GridPanel, List ,Bridge or LookupList component.
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> groupable
          If the results can be grouped by this column (only has effect if the GridPanel.getEnableGroupBy() method returns True )
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.Boolean> hidden
          If the column is hidden or not by default
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> hideable
          If this column can be hidden (by the user)
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewStateBindProperty<java.lang.String> label
          The label to show in the table header column
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewBindProperty<java.lang.String> lookupViewer
          Force the lookup viewer name when searching by this column.
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<GridColumnRenderer> renderer
          An implementation of the GridColumnRenderer interface which allows the column attribute to rendered in a custom way
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBaseProperty<java.lang.String> renderTemplate
          Render template, or JSON object with several render templates according to the value for this column.
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> resizable
          If the column size (width) can be changed by the user (only has effect if the GridPanel.getEnableColumnResize() method returns True )
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> searchable
          If the results of the grid panel can be searched by this column
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> sortable
          If the rows of the panel can be sorted by this column (only has effect if the GridPanel.getEnableColumnSort() method returns True )
private  netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBaseProperty<java.lang.String> sqlExpression
          SQL query to execute to retrieve the values of this column

Field Detail

dataField

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBaseProperty<java.lang.String> dataField
Name of the column of the DataListConnector / boObjectList from the parent GridPanel, List ,Bridge or LookupList component. Can also be used as alias to SQL columns

sqlExpression

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBaseProperty<java.lang.String> sqlExpression
SQL query to execute to retrieve the values of this column

label

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewStateBindProperty<java.lang.String> label
The label to show in the table header column

The width of this column (in pixels)

searchable

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> searchable
If the results of the grid panel can be searched by this column

sortable

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> sortable
If the rows of the panel can be sorted by this column (only has effect if the GridPanel.getEnableColumnSort() method returns True )

groupable

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> groupable
If the results can be grouped by this column (only has effect if the GridPanel.getEnableGroupBy() method returns True )

hideable

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> hideable
If this column can be hidden (by the user)

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<java.lang.Boolean> hidden
If the column is hidden or not by default

resizable

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> resizable
If the column size (width) can be changed by the user (only has effect if the GridPanel.getEnableColumnResize() method returns True )

contentHtml

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewProperty<java.lang.Boolean> contentHtml
Marks the content of the column as HTML, this is used when exporting the column values to another format (excel, pdf) and it marks that the content is HTML (or not) and will be converted to final format knowing this.

renderTemplate

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBaseProperty<java.lang.String> renderTemplate
Render template, or JSON object with several render templates according to the value for this column. To render the value of the column in the template use "%s" (see example) Example (Single Render Template - Renders the column value in red and bold) renderTemplate="<div style=\'color:red;font-weight:bold\'>%s</div>" Example (Multiple Render Templates, according to value) renderTemplate=" { 'SYSUSER': '<div style=\'color:red;font-weight:bold\'>%s</div>', '':'Null', 'default': 'Other' } "

lookupViewer

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIViewBindProperty<java.lang.String> lookupViewer
Force the lookup viewer name when searching by this column.

renderer

private netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIBindProperty<GridColumnRenderer> renderer
An implementation of the GridColumnRenderer interface which allows the column attribute to rendered in a custom way

java.io.CharArrayWriter templateBuffer

setContentHtml

public void setContentHtml(java.lang.String sBooleanContentHtml)
Toggle the column value is Html or not. This to be used when exporting to a non HTML format, if this flag is set to true the renderer will try to convert the html to the final format. Eg: If exporting to a PDF and this atribute is set to true the Html is converted to PDF

Parameters:
sBooleanContentHtml - true/false

setContentHtml

public void setContentHtml(boolean sBooleanContentHtml)
Toggle the column value is Html or not. This to be used when exporting to a non HTML format, if this flag is set to true the renderer will try to convert the html to the final format. Eg: If exporting to a PDF and this atribute is set to true the Html is converted to PDF

Parameters:
sBooleanContentHtml - true/false
